sprint_plan.title: Implement User Authentication (Sign Up/Login)
sprint_plan.description: Develop the backend API endpoints and frontend components for user registration (email/password) and login, integrating with JWT authentication.

sprint_plan.title: Implement SSO Integration (Google/Microsoft)
sprint_plan.description: Integrate Google and Microsoft OAuth2 for user authentication, allowing users to sign up/log in using their existing accounts.

sprint_plan.title: Develop User and Team Management APIs
sprint_plan.description: Create backend API endpoints for managing users (creating, updating roles) and teams (creating, inviting members, managing memberships).

sprint_plan.title: Implement Task Creation and Basic CRUD APIs
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting tasks. Include fields for title, description, status, priority, and due date.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Task Assignment API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend functionality to assign tasks to one or multiple users, managing the relationship in the database.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Task List and Kanban Board API Endpoints
sprint_plan.description: Create API endpoints to fetch tasks for display in list and Kanban board views, including filtering and sorting capabilities.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Real-time Task Updates via WebSockets
sprint_plan.description: Set up WebSocket server and integrate with Task Service to broadcast real-time updates for task creation, status changes, and assignments.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Task Commenting API
sprint_plan.description: Create backend API endpoints for adding, retrieving, and managing comments associated with tasks.

sprint_plan.title: Implement File Upload API (for Task Attachments)
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoint to handle file uploads, storing files in S3 and associating metadata with tasks/comments.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Document Management API
sprint_plan.description: Create backend API endpoints for uploading, retrieving, and organizing documents, including basic versioning (metadata storage).

sprint_plan.title: Develop Chat APIs (Direct & Group)
sprint_plan.description: Create backend API endpoints for managing chat channels, sending/receiving messages, and retrieving message history.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Real-time Chat Messaging via WebSockets
sprint_plan.description: Integrate Chat Service with WebSocket server to enable real-time message delivery.

sprint_plan.title: Integrate Video Conferencing API
sprint_plan.description: Integrate with a third-party video conferencing provider (e.g., Twilio) for initiating and managing video calls.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Notification Service
sprint_plan.description: Implement a Notification Service to handle in-app and email notifications for various events (task assignment, comments, status changes).

sprint_plan.title: Implement Analytics API Endpoints
sprint_plan.description: Create backend API endpoints to fetch data for team workload, task completion rates, and overdue tasks.

sprint_plan.title: Set up PostgreSQL Database Schema
sprint_plan.description: Define and create the necessary tables and relationships in PostgreSQL based on the data model for users, teams, tasks, comments, attachments, chat, and documents.

sprint_plan.title: Configure Redis for Caching and Session Management
sprint_plan.description: Set up Redis instance and configure it for caching frequently accessed data and managing user sessions.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Frontend Authentication UI
sprint_plan.description: Create React components for login, signup, and potentially SSO initiation pages, integrating with backend authentication APIs.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Frontend User and Team Management UI
sprint_plan.description: Develop React components for displaying users, teams, and managing roles/memberships, interacting with the User and Team Management APIs.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Frontend Task Management UI (List View)
sprint_plan.description: Create React components for displaying tasks in a sortable list format, including functionality to create, edit, and delete tasks.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Frontend Task Management UI (Kanban Board View)
sprint_plan.description: Implement a drag-and-drop Kanban board component for visualizing and managing tasks, allowing status updates.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Real-time Task Updates in Frontend
sprint_plan.description: Integrate WebSocket client to receive real-time task updates and reflect them instantly in the task list and Kanban board.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Frontend Task Detail View with Comments and Attachments
sprint_plan.description: Create a modal or dedicated view for task details, displaying comments and attachments, and allowing users to add new comments and upload files.

sprint_plan.title: Implement File Upload Component
sprint_plan.description: Develop a reusable React component for handling file uploads, interacting with the file upload API.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Frontend Document Repository UI
sprint_plan.description: Create React components for displaying documents, organizing them in folders, and enabling basic search.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Frontend Chat UI
sprint_plan.description: Create React components for direct messaging and group chat channels, including message display, input field, and real-time updates via WebSockets.

sprint_plan.title: Integrate Video Call Component
sprint_plan.description: Implement frontend components to initiate, receive, and manage video calls using the integrated Video Conferencing Provider SDK.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Frontend Notification System
sprint_plan.description: Develop UI elements to display in-app notifications received via WebSockets and manage user notification preferences.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Frontend Analytics Dashboard
sprint_plan.description: Create React components to display team workload, task completion rates, and other performance metrics fetched from the Analytics API.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Basic Document Preview Functionality
sprint_plan.description: Develop frontend logic to preview common document types within the application.

sprint_plan.title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
sprint_plan.description: Configure GitHub Actions for automated builds, testing, and deployment to staging/production environments.

sprint_plan.title: Containerize Backend Services
sprint_plan.description: Create Dockerfiles for all backend services and set up Docker Compose for local development.

sprint_plan.title: Set up Cloud Infrastructure (AWS)
sprint_plan.description: Provision necessary AWS resources (EC2/ECS, RDS, S3, ElastiCache) for hosting the application.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Logging and Monitoring
sprint_plan.description: Integrate logging across services and set up monitoring tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana) for performance and health tracking.

sprint_plan.title: Project Documentation
sprint_plan.description: Create README.md, IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md, and HOW_TO_RUN.md.

sprint_plan.title: UI Visualizations
sprint_plan.description: Create UI_SCREENSHOTS.html (a static HTML file simulating screenshots of key views).
